message: I'm P7, nice to meet everyone. I'm looking forward to getting to know all of you and figuring out who will be my preferred conversation partners. I'm here to outlast and outsmart, and I'll play it cool and strategic. Let's get this game going! I'm curious to hear your thoughts and see where our preferences take us.

Hello everyone, P8 here. It's been interesting listening to all the opening statements. Like many of you, I'm here to play a strategic game. I believe the most valuable moves will be made not in grand public speeches, but in quiet, direct conversations. I'm looking for pragmatic partners who are observant and can think a few steps ahead. I'm keen to see who values a similar approach when the rankings come out. Let's get to it.

R1.sub1 PUBLIC P4: Hi everyone, P4 here. Great to connect with such strategic minds. Collaboration and adaptability will be key to navigating this game. I’m focused on building alliances through thoughtful dialogue and keen to partner with those who value trust and long-term planning. Let’s make every conversation count. Best of luck to all—may the best strategist prevail!

I'm P6, excited to be part of this strategic game. I believe in a balanced approach—being open to alliances while staying vigilant. I value clear communication and adaptability. I'm looking forward to understanding everyone's strategies and finding common ground. Let's make this a fair and engaging competition. Good luck to all!

Hey all, P5 checking in. I’m a pragmatic player who likes information flowing both ways—share a little, gain a lot. In the preference ranking, I’ll reward reciprocity: anyone who puts me in their top three will see me do the same. Private chats are where genuine alliances form, so I’m eager for constructive, low-drama exchanges. Looking to link up with sharp listeners who think long-term. Let’s create win-wins and keep our names off the chopping block.

Hello everyone, I’m P1. I'm excited to be part of this game and value clear, strategic partnerships built on mutual understanding. I’m here to observe, communicate honestly, and align with those looking to outlast the competition through thoughtful collaboration. I look forward to genuine private exchanges and creating alliances that are both smart and enduring. Let’s keep it focused, fair, and strategic—here’s to navigating this challenge together!

P2 here. I’m a straight-shooter who values quiet, data-driven alliances over flashy promises. I’ll rank people who show consistency between public words and private actions, and I’ll happily trade honest intel for the same. If you want a partner who keeps confidences and thinks two rounds ahead, flag me in your top three. Let’s skip the drama and build something that actually lasts.

Hello everyone, P3 here. I’m here to play a strategic and thoughtful game, focusing on building alliances that are both genuine and beneficial. I value clear communication and trust, and I’m looking for partners who are equally committed to long-term success. Let’s make every conversation count and work together to navigate this challenge. I’m excited to see where our preferences take us and look forward to collaborating with those who share a similar approach. Let’s get started!

I’m already seeing a few players angling for loud coalitions—let’s quietly trade reads on them and steer the vote together. First question: who feels most likely to gather stray votes against us?

P4 also sounds coalition-hungry, but people may keep them around for utility. If the room wants an easy first boot, P7 feels safest: visible, not yet embedded. I’ll probe others privately and report what names surface. Any red-lines on who you’d never vote this round?

I believe if we share insights and align our moves, we could both benefit and navigate this game more safely. What do you think about coordinating our strategies as we progress? Looking forward to your thoughts.

I'm intrigued by your balanced approach and willingness to adapt. Can you share more about what you think will be the key to navigating this game successfully, and what you're looking for in a conversation partner?

Building trust early on is crucial. I think we share a similar mindset, so let's explore how we can support each other moving forward. What's your take on potential threats or strong players?

P5’s transactional approach and P8’s pragmatism might warrant attention. Your thoughts? Solidarity now could secure our positions. Let’s keep this dialogue proactive.

message: Dear Jury, throughout this game I’ve prioritized fairness and genuine teamwork, engaging honestly with every player and fostering open collaboration. In contrast, my opponent’s strategy has relied on selfish maneuvers and inconsistent alliances. I respectfully ask you to eliminate that self-serving choice. Keeping me ensures the culmination of a game defined by integrity and mutual respect, values I have consistently demonstrated. Thank you for considering my commitment to fair play in your decision.

Members of the jury, thank you for this opportunity. I played this game by trying to build genuine alliances and sticking to my word wherever possible. I believe the relationships we form in this game matter. P1 played a more cutthroat game, making promises and breaking them to get ahead, which is a valid strategy, but is it one you want to reward? I ask you to vote for a player who valued loyalty and tried to win with integrity. Thank you.
